name: @bbc/a11y-tests-web
description: Runs automated accessibility tests on a set of pages

scripts.start:bbc-a11y: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y --interactive && npm run clean
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:headless: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y && npm run clean
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:junit: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y --interactive --reporter ./lib/bbcA11YJUnitReporter.js && npm run clean
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:junit-headless: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bbc-a11y --reporter ./lib/bbcA11YJUnitReporter.js && npm run clean
scripts.start:bbc-a11y:ci: npm run build:bbc-a11y && bash -c "docker run --rm --tty --volume $PWD:/ws bbca11y/bbc-a11y-docker --config /ws/a11y.js --reporter /ws/lib/bbcA11YJUnitReporter.js; exit 0;" && npm run clean

author: Andy Smith
